translation.en: We're gonna make it home
- We're gonna make it home... - Run complete.
Well done, Emily. Five point three miles. Forty- one minutes.
translation.es: Bien hecho, Emily. Corriste 5.3 millas en 41 minutos, 18 segundos más rápido que ayer.

translation.en: Eighteen seconds faster than yesterday.
translation.es: Corriste 5.3 millas en 41 minutos, 18 segundos más rápido que ayer.

translation.en: - Good effort. -
- - Madeline, you're in Adweek. What? Where?
Right here, under Movers and Shakers.
- Ah! - Chicago- based Gilbert Group expands international portfolio
translation.es: Gilbert Group amplía su cartera internacional

translation.en: with acquisition of French luxury marketing company Savoir.
translation.es: con la compra de Savoir, agencia de marketing francesa.

translation.en: Gilbert Group vet, Madeline Wheeler, named director of marketing for Franco firm.
translation.es: Madeline Wheeler será la directora de marketing de la agencia francesa.

translation.en: Yes! I am here to prove that a master's in French does not go to waste.
translation.es: ¡Sí! Se demuestra que el máster en francés ha servido de algo.

translation.en: - This is going to be amazing for you. -
I have been dreaming of moving to Paris forever.
translation.es: Siempre soñé con mudarme a París.

translation.en: I mean, French men, they love older women, you know?
translation.es: Los franceses adoran las mujeres mayores.

translation.en: Look at their president. He's young. He's hot. - He married his schoolteacher. -
translation.es: Su presidente es joven y atractivo, y se casó con su maestra.

translation.en: Ooh, I just emailed you my thoughts on the presentation for the new IBS drug.
translation.es: Te envié ideas para la presentación del fármaco contra la acidez.

translation.en: It's a social initiative to add meditation to your medication.
translation.es: Es una iniciativa social para sumar meditación a la medicación.

translation.en: If you like it, you can pitch it later. Uh, you know, for your last hurrah.
translation.es: Si te gusta, podrías presentarlo a modo de despedida.

translation.en: - I want you to pitch it. - Seriously?
Seriously. The client has to start getting comfortable with you.
translation.es: - ¿En serio? - Sí. El cliente debe acostumbrarse.

translation.en: I don't want to step on your toes.
You're not. You're stepping into my shoes. You're ready, okay?
translation.es: No, vas a reemplazarme. Ya estás lista.

translation.en: This is an opportunity for both of us. Come here. Try this.
translation.es: Será genial para ambas. Ven, prueba esto.

translation.en: What is it?
De L'Heure.
It's the latest fragrance from Maison Lavaux.
translation.es: La fragancia más reciente de Maison Lavaux.

translation.en: I'll be handling them, their account in Paris. What do you think?
translation.es: Me ocuparé de su cuenta en París. ¿Qué piensas?

translation.en: It's like wearing poetry.
I'm gonna use that.
Oh, that smells really wei-- Does that smell weird to you?
translation.es: Esto huele muy… ¿No te huele raro?

translation.en: - No, just floral. - But...
I'm gonna be sick. Uh... I'm gonna be sick.
- Hi, babe! - Hey. Oh.
- Yes! - What happened?
Bote just smacked a walk- off grand slam, two outs left in the bottom of the ninth.
translation.es: Bote hizo un grand slam en la novena entrada.

translation.en: - Oh, my God! - Hell yeah!
Yeah! Cubs are goin' to the playoffs, baby!
- Can we get a couple of beers here? - White wine, actually.
- Anything French, if you have it. - For sure.
I have some crazy news.
- Madeline's pregnant. - Madeline?
- Mm- hm. - Like, your boss, Madeline?
- Thought she was too old to get pregnant. - Well, so did she.
translation.es: - Creí que ya era mayor. - Ella también.

translation.en: Until she got completely nauseous sniffing this perfume
translation.es: Hasta que vomitó al oler un perfume que iba a promocionar

translation.en: she was planning to promote. She went to the doctor this afternoon.
translation.es: Hasta que vomitó al oler un perfume que iba a promocionar y fue al médico.

translation.en: - Wow. So, who's the dad? - Oh, well, there are a few candidates.
translation.es: - ¿Quién es el papá? - Hay varios candidatos.

translation.en: - She was having a lot of going- away sex. - Hey. Go, Madeline.
translation.es: Tuvo mucho sexo de despedida. Bien por ella.

translation.en: But now that she's pregnant, she's decided she's not gonna take the job in Paris.
translation.es: Pero ahora que está embarazada, no aceptará el trabajo en París.

translation.en: So, there goes your promotion?
Not exactly. They still need someone there.
translation.es: No exactamente. Necesitan que alguien vaya.

translation.en: Like, American eyes and ears to help with the whole transition.
translation.es: Un estadounidense para ayudar con la transición.

translation.en: So they asked me if I would take the job...
translation.es: Así que me pidieron que aceptara el trabajo.

translation.en: for a year.
What? In Paris?
They said that if I did that they'd guarantee me senior brand manager when I'm back.
translation.es: Me garantizaría ser gerente de marca cuando regrese.

translation.en: So, the apartment there is already all set up, and there's a relocation bonus.
translation.es: El alojamiento ya está listo y hay un bono de reubicación.

translation.en: And just to explore the idea, here's a spreadsheet I made for the next year.
translation.es: Y para explorar la idea, armé un cronograma para el próximo año.

translation.en: Weeks when you might be able to come to Paris,
translation.es: Fechas en las que podrías venir a París

translation.en: times I can come back to Chicago,
taking into consideration vacation and sick days.
Wait.
You're serious?
I know it's crazy, but when will we get a chance like this?
translation.es: Sé que es una locura, pero es una oportunidad única.

translation.en: - It'll be an adventure. - Unless I missed something,
translation.es: - Será una aventura. - ¿Me perdí de algo?

translation.en: you don't speak French.
Fake it till you make it.
You look worried.
Oh, I'm not worried. It's the French who should be worried.
translation.es: No estoy preocupado. Los franceses deberían estarlo.

translation.en: - Uh, Emily Cooper? - Yes.
Hey. I'm Gilles Dufour from the rental agency.
translation.es: Hola, soy Gilles Dufour, de la inmobiliaria.

translation.en: - I've got your keys. Apartment 501. -
- Hi. - A s'il vous plaît
- Goes a long way... - The building is very old.
translation.es: El edificio es muy viejo. No tiene ascensor.

translation.en: - It doesn't have an elevator. - Okay.
translation.es: El edificio es muy viejo. No tiene ascensor. De acuerdo.

translation.en: It's charming.
Is this it?
It's on the fifth floor.
- This is the fourth floor. - Uh,
I just schlepped up these bags five flights. - This is the fifth floor. -
translation.es: Arrastré las maletas por cinco pisos, estoy segura.

translation.en: In France, first the ground floor,
translation.es: En Francia, el primero es la planta baja.

translation.en: then the first floor, then the second floor, and so on.
translation.es: Luego el primer piso, el segundo, y así.

translation.en: That's weird.
Your magnificent chambre de bonne.
Chambre de what now?
Chambre de b-- Um, it means, uh, the room for the housekeeper.
translation.es: Chambre de bo… El cuarto para el ama de llaves.

translation.en: The top two floors were typically reserved for the servants.
translation.es: Los sirvientes solían vivir en los dos pisos superiores.

translation.en: The space is small, but the view...
Oh, my God, I feel like Nicole Kidman in Moulin Rouge!
translation.es: Me siento como Nicole Kidman en Moulin Rouge.

translation.en: You've got all of Paris at your feet.
translation.es: Tienes a París a tus pies.

translation.en: There is a wonderful café just down below.
- A friend of mine is the manager. - Wow.
translation.es: - Es de un amigo mío. - Vaya.

translation.en: - So, ça va ? It's good? -
Oui. Oui. Très good. - Très wonderful.  - Great.
translation.es: - Oui. Très genial. Très maravilloso. - Genial.

translation.en: Are you hungry? Would you like to have a coffee or...?
Oh, actually, I have to get to my office.
Oh. Maybe you want to have a drink tonight?
I have a boyfriend.
- In Paris? - In Chicago.
- So you don't have a boyfriend in Paris. -
translation.es: Entonces, no tienes novio en París.

translation.en: - Can I just get my keys, s'il vous plaît ? - Yeah.
translation.es: - ¿Me das las llaves, s'il vous plaît? - Sí.

translation.en: Um, my number is on the card if you need me for anything,
translation.es: Este es mi número por si me necesitas o cambias de opinión.

translation.en: - and in case you change your mind. - I won't.
translation.es: Este es mi número por si me necesitas o cambias de opinión. No lo haré.

translation.en: - Bye- bye, now. - Yeah.
Hi. Hello.
Uh, bonjour. I'm Emily Cooper from the Gilbert Group in Chicago.
translation.es: Bonjour. Soy Emily Cooper de Gilbert Group de Chicago.

translation.en: You are?  I'm sorry. I don't understand.
- I'm going to be working in this office. -
translation.es: Voy a trabajar en esta oficina.

translation.en: - - The American girl is here.
I wasn't expecting you until tomorrow.
How was your journey here? The new apartment and everything?
translation.es: ¿Cómo estuvo tu viaje? ¿Qué tal el apartamento nuevo?

translation.en: You lost me at bonjour.
Yeah, I was told the American coming here spoke French.
Oh, that was Madeline.
Oh, so you're not Madeline.
Uh, I'm Emily. Emily Cooper. And I am so excited to be here.
translation.es: Soy Emily, Emily Cooper. Y estoy muy emocionada de estar aquí.

translation.en: Well, that's very unfortunate.
- Excuse me? - That you don't speak French.
It's a problem.
Well, I'm going to take a class, but...  ...je parle un peu français already.
translation.es: Tomaré lecciones, pero je parle un peu français ya.

translation.en: Well, perhaps it's better not to try.
- - Oh, Paul.
May I introduce Emily, the American girl who's come to work with us?
translation.es: Te presento a Emily, la estadounidense que trabajará aquí.

translation.en: This is Monsieur Brossard, he's the founder of Savoir.
translation.es: Él es el señor Brossard, fundador de Savoir.

translation.en: - Ah. Emily Cooper. Oh. - Hello.
It is so nice to meet you, Monsieur Brossard.
It's a pleasure. Welcome to Paris.
So, you've come to teach the French some American tricks?
translation.es: ¿Viniste a enseñarnos trucos a los franceses?

translation.en: I'm sure we have a lot to learn from each other.
But your experience is not with fashion
translation.es: Pero no tienes experiencia en moda ni marcas de lujo.

translation.en: - and luxury brands, hm? - True.
translation.es: Pero no tienes experiencia en moda ni marcas de lujo. Es cierto. Me especializo en promoción de fármacos y geriátricos.

translation.en: Most of my experience has been in promoting pharmaceuticals and geriatric care facilities.
translation.es: Es cierto. Me especializo en promoción de fármacos y geriátricos.

translation.en: In Chicago.
Yes. I mean, oui.
I was in Chicago once, - and I ate the deep- dish pizza. - Ah.
translation.es: Una vez fui a Chicago y comí su famosa pizza.

translation.en: That is our specialty.
We take a lot of pride.
It was, uh, dégueulasse. How you say?
- Disgusting. -
- Like a quiche made of cement. - Uh...
Oh, no, you must have gone to Lou Malnati's.
translation.es: Debe haber ido a Lou Malnati.

translation.en: And the people are so fat.
translation.es: Y la gente es muy gorda.

translation.en: Why are they all so fat?
Well, perhaps from the disgusting food.
translation.es: Tal vez por la comida asquerosa.

translation.en: True, we are in the midst of an obesity epidemic.
translation.es: Sí, hay una epidemia de obesidad.

translation.en: In fact, Merck was one of our biggest clients.
translation.es: Merck fue uno de nuestros clientes.

translation.en: They make a diabetes drug that we marketed the heck out of.
translation.es: Comercializamos su medicamento para la diabetes

translation.en: Sales went up 63 percent.
translation.es: y subimos sus ventas en un 63 %.

translation.en: So you create the disease, then you treat the disease, and then you market the treatments of the disease.
translation.es: Entonces, crean la enfermedad, la tratan y luego comercializan los tratamientos.

translation.en: - Well... - Perhaps stop eating.
- There is no money in that. - True.
Cigarettes cause diabetes and cancer.
translation.es: Los cigarrillos causan diabetes y cáncer.

translation.en: Yes.  Well, smoking is a pleasure.
And without pleasure, who are we?
- German? -
Exactly right.
All of the brands we market here, from perfume to cognac to couture,
translation.es: Todas las marcas que comercializamos, perfumes, coñac y alta costura,

translation.en: - are all to do with beauty and refinement. - Mm- hmm.
translation.es: tienen que ver con la belleza y el refinamiento.

translation.en: Perhaps you have something to learn from us,
translation.es: Tal vez tengas algo que aprender de nosotros,

translation.en: but I'm not sure if we have much to learn from you.
translation.es: pero no sé si tenemos mucho que aprender de ti.

translation.en: With all due respect, I have been sent here for a reason,
translation.es: Con todo respeto, me enviaron por algo,

translation.en: so if you wouldn't mind, I would really like to share some of my ideas about your social media strategies.
translation.es: así que quisiera comentarles mis ideas sobre sus estrategias de redes sociales.

translation.en: You mean the Twitter and the Snapchat?
Yes. And the Instagram.
Ah, by all means.
First, let me apologize for speaking English.
translation.es: Primero, perdón por no hablar en francés.

translation.en: I did Rosetta Stone on the plane, but it hasn't kicked in yet.
translation.es: Usé una aplicación de idiomas, pero aún no aprendí.

translation.en: - - Oh, Patricia doesn't speak English.
Please continue.
For those of you who haven't met me, I'm Emily Cooper,
translation.es: Para los que no me conocen, soy Emily Cooper,

translation.en: and I'm so excited to be here in Paris.
translation.es: y me alegra mucho estar en París.

translation.en: I'm looking forward to getting to know each and every one of you
translation.es: Tengo muchas ganas de conocerlos a todos

translation.en: and, likewise, having you get to know me.
translation.es: y de que ustedes me conozcan a mí.

translation.en: Your name, monsieur? My name is Luc.
Yes, Luc?
Why are you shouting?
Sorry.
Your company works with some of the biggest brands
translation.es: Su empresa trabaja con las marcas más importantes

translation.en: in the luxury sector, from Chanel to YSL.
translation.es: del sector del lujo, de Chanel a YSL.

translation.en: And that makes Savoir, your company, or, if I may be so bold,
translation.es: Por eso Savoir, su compañía, o, si me lo permiten, nuestra compañía, es una marca en sí misma.

translation.en: our company, a brand in itself.
translation.es: o, si me lo permiten, nuestra compañía, es una marca en sí misma.

translation.en: But to build a brand, you must create meaningful social media engagement.
translation.es: Para construir una marca hay que participar en las redes sociales.

translation.en: May I ask who's responsible for your social media here?
Patricia.
Makes sense.
Anyway,
it's not just about the number of followers.
translation.es: no se trata de la cantidad de seguidores, sino del contenido, la confianza,

translation.en: It's about content, trust, interest, and engagement.
translation.es: no se trata de la cantidad de seguidores, sino del contenido, la confianza, el interés y el compromiso.

translation.en: Excuse me, but the French are masters of social media.
translation.es: Disculpa, pero los franceses dominan las redes sociales.

translation.en: True.
But Americans invented it, which is why I hope to become a valuable member of your team
translation.es: Pero los estadounidenses las inventaron, por eso espero ser un valioso aporte

translation.en: by adding an American point of view to your fabulous French clients.
translation.es: al dar mi punto de vista a sus fabulosos clientes franceses.

translation.en: It's a disaster.
Paul.
- What? - Who is that girl?
It was one of the terms of the sale. - They send us one of their people. -
translation.es: El contrato nos obliga a tener a uno de ellos aquí.

translation.en: - How long do we have to put up with this? - Well, until she decides to leave.
translation.es: - ¿Hasta cuándo deberemos soportarla? - Hasta que decida irse.

translation.en: With me as her boss, we'll see how long she lasts.
translation.es: Veremos cuánto dura conmigo como su jefa.

translation.en: Right, I have to go.
It's amazing, isn't it?
The entire city looks like Ratatouille.
It's beautiful.
So beautiful.
Ah. Hey, how was the first day?
Great.
Okay, maybe a few things got lost in translation.
It took them a minute to realize I was me and not Madeline, but I really feel like I could be a big asset here.
translation.es: Tardaron en entender que no era Madeline, pero creo que podría serles muy útil.

translation.en: Hey, look what I got.
Thank God! You're gonna love Paris.
I don't want to spend another day in the most romantic city in the world
translation.es: No quiero estar en la ciudad más romántica del mundo sin ti.

translation.en: - without you. - I'll be there soon, okay?
Hurry. I miss you already here.
translation.es: Que sea rápido. Ya te extraño.

translation.en: Bye.
- - Ugh, seriously?
God.
Okay.
Come on.
This can't be happening. Come on.
Sorry, I... I thought this was my apartment. Fifth floor?
translation.es: Lo siento, creí que era mi apartamento. ¿Es el quinto piso?

translation.en: This is the fourth floor.
Fifth floor.
Right.
Uh, I'm Emily. Emily Cooper, your... your new neighbor.
translation.es: Soy Emily. Emily Cooper, tu nueva vecina.

translation.en: American?
Oui. From Chicago.
Gabriel, French, from Normandy.
Oh, I know that beach. Saving Private Ryan.
translation.es: Conozco esa playa. Rescatando al soldado Ryan.

translation.en: - What? - D- Day?
- Uh, anyway. -
Nice to meet you, neighbor.
Good morning, miss.
Merci. Have un bonne journée.
translation.es: Merci. Que tenga un bonne journée.

translation.en: - Get back to the beat... - Oh, my God.
- We ain't got no hope - Oh, my God.
I see you in the darkness, baby
- Surrounded by the moonlight, baby - Mm. Oh, my God.
Sylvie, it's Emily. Um, are we closed today, or is there a national holiday I don't know about?
translation.es: Sylvie, soy Emily. ¿Hoy no abrimos o hay un feriado del que no sé?

translation.en: 'Cause I've been hanging around here for two hours and...
translation.es: Estoy aquí hace dos horas y…

translation.en: - - What are you doing?
I've been here since 8:30.
Pourquoi ? We open at 10:30.
Hi Patricia. I'm wondering if I can share some ideas I have
about how we might enhance our social media engagement.
translation.es: sobre cómo mejorar la presencia en las redes sociales?

translation.en: I'm so excited about the potential here.
Patricia, I'd like to share some ideas
about how we might enhance our social media engagement.
translation.es: sobre cómo mejorar la presencia en las redes sociales?

translation.en: - Do you wanna have lunch? - No, I'll have a cigarette.
Uh, I have a... bad stomach.
I have a previous engagement.
- Excusez- moi !  - Laurent! Sybil!
Apologize to the lady!
I'm sorry. Can I buy you another one?
Sorry, I don't speak French.
- Ah, American? - Yes.
But did you think that I was French?
Honestly, no. I was being polite. You... look American.
translation.es: Honestamente, no, fui amable. Pareces estadounidense.

translation.en: Are you from Indiana?
- Chicago. - Oh. I was close.
I went to junior high in Indianapolis.
translation.es: - Fui a la secundaria en Indianápolis. - ¡Genial!

translation.en: - Oh, cool. No way! Why? - Mm- hm.
translation.es: - Fui a la secundaria en Indianápolis. - ¡Genial! - ¿Por qué? - Larga historia.

translation.en: Ah, long story.
Very boring.  The story and... Indianapolis.
translation.es: Muy aburrida. La historia e Indianápolis.

translation.en: But the girls, they look like you. Nice.
translation.es: Pero las chicas se parecen a ti. Son amables.

translation.en: - Are those your children? - No, I'm their nanny.
translation.es: - ¿Son tus hijos? - No, soy su niñera.

translation.en: Laurent! Stay where I can see you.
I'm teaching them Mandarin.
How long have you been here?
Uh... almost a year. From Shanghai.
translation.es: Casi un año. Vine de Shanghái.

translation.en: But my mother's from Korea. Another long, boring story.
translation.es: Pero mi mamá es de Corea. Otra historia larga y aburrida.

translation.en: - Do you love it? - Uh, yes, of course I love Paris.
translation.es: - ¿Te encanta? - Sí, claro que me encanta París.

translation.en: - And the food is so delicious. - Mm.
The fashion, so chic.
The lights, so magical.
But the people... so mean.
translation.es: Pero la gente… es muy mala.

translation.en: - I mean, they can't all be mean. - Oh, yes, they can.
translation.es: - No pueden ser todos malos. - Claro que sí.

translation.en: Chinese people are mean behind your back.
translation.es: Los chinos son malos a tus espaldas.

translation.en: - French people, mean to your face. - Mm.
translation.es: Los franceses son malos de frente.

translation.en: - But you're on vacation here, so... - Oh, no. Actually, I work here.
translation.es: Pero estás de vacaciones… No, trabajo aquí en una empresa de marketing francesa.

translation.en: I have a job with a French marketing firm.
translation.es: No, trabajo aquí en una empresa de marketing francesa.

translation.en: - Seriously? - Yeah.
Well, so you know.
Well, I just started.
- Do you have any friends in Paris? - Uh, no.
Um... but my boyfriend's coming next week to visit, so...
translation.es: Pero mi novio vendrá la próxima semana.

translation.en: Are you lonely?
No... uh...
- Sometimes.  - Give me your phone.
- Uh... - Okay, so here's my number.
You're lonely, you text me, we have dinner. I'm Mindy.
translation.es: Si te sientes sola, escríbeme y cenaremos. Soy Mindy.

translation.en: Emily.
Nice to meet you. - French people do this. - Oh.
translation.es: - Un gusto. - Los franceses saludan así.

translation.en: Sybil! Laurent!
- You're not my mother! - I want an ice cream!

translation.es: 72 SEGUIDORES #BATALLA REAL EN EL PALACIO REAL

translation.en: What is la plouc?
It's a little term of endearment, like, um, mon petit chou, la plouc...
Nice.  Don't worry about it.
translation.es: Es algo bueno. No te preocupes.

translation.en: La plouc.
- - The hick.
Sorry, I don't speak French.
Oh, I'm sorry. Um, is the seat free?
- Uh, yes... yes, please. Yeah. - Yeah? Okay.
Thank you.
- Ah, Emily. Ah... - Luc! Hi.
I... I just want to say I am sorry for this.
translation.es: Solo quiero decir que lo siento.

translation.en: I... I do not agree to calling you la plouc.
translation.es: No estoy de acuerdo en llamarte la plouc.

translation.en: And... I can, uh...?
Y-- yes.
You know...
- Mm, I'm good. - Ah? Okay.
You know, we are all a little afraid of you.
translation.es: Todos te tenemos un poco de miedo.

translation.en: What?
- Afraid of me? - Mm- hm.
How?
Y-- your ideas.
They are more new. Maybe they are better.
translation.es: Son novedosas. Tal vez sean mejores.

translation.en: - - Now you are here, and,
uh, maybe we feel we have to work harder,
translation.es: y creemos que debemos esforzarnos más.

translation.en: make more money.
It's a balance.
Ex-- exactly. A balance.
And I think the Americans have the wrong balance.
translation.es: Y creo que los estadounidenses no equilibran bien.

translation.en: You live to work.
We work to live.
Yes, it's good to make money, but what you say is success,
translation.es: Sí, es bueno ganar dinero, pero lo que para ti es éxito,

translation.en: I say is punishment.
But... I enjoy work...
and accomplishment. It...
It makes me happy.
Work makes you happy?
Yes. I mean, it's... it's... it's why I'm here. For work.
translation.es: Sí. Por eso estoy aquí. Por mi trabajo.

translation.en: And look where it's brought me. To this beautiful city.
translation.es: Y mira adónde me condujo, a esta hermosa ciudad.

translation.en: Maybe you don't know what it is to be happy.
translation.es: Quizá no sabes lo que es ser feliz.

translation.en: Or maybe that's a little arrogant.
translation.es: O quizá tú seas un poco arrogante.

translation.en: Ah. You came to Paris and you don't speak French.
translation.es: Viniste a París y no hablas francés,

translation.en: That is arrogant.
More ignorant than arrogant.
Well, let's call it the arrogance of ignorance.
translation.es: Digamos que es la arrogancia de la ignorancia.

translation.en: I'm sorry if I offended you.
Oh, I'm not offended by anything.
I see you tomorrow, Emily. Mm- hm?
Ah. Don't be early.
Oh, hey. There you are.
Is everything okay?
Yeah, I just finally got home from work.
It's 3:00 a.m. here.
It's 7:00 p.m. here.
What are you doin'?
Sleeping.
I miss you so much.
And I miss you too.
- Hello? Doug? -
Get naked with me.
Are we having cybersex?
Well... if you insist.
- Hold on.  -
You better not be recording this.
No. Never.
Oh, wow. You are so beautiful.
Mm, thanks.
Uh, so, um...
...you do you, and...
I'll do me.
